name: fullstack-dashboard-monorepo
description: Monorepo for Full-Stack Dashboard (Excel upload -> metrics + charts + world map).

scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend "npm --workspace=@fsdash/backend run dev" "npm --workspace=@fsdash/frontend run dev"
scripts.start: npm --workspace=@fsdash/backend run start & npm --workspace=@fsdash/frontend run start
